topic: Jailbreak Evaluation and Benchmarking of Vision-Language Models

  entities:
    MM-safetybench|Benchmark
    jailbreakV-28K|Benchmark
    SIUO|Benchmark
    MMJ-Bench|Benchmark
    Retention Score|Method
    Llama3 Guard|Model
    GPT-4o-mini|Model
    CLIP|Model
    MiniGPT-4|Model
    Claude-3.5-sonnet|Model
    GPT-4o|Model
    Llama-3.2-90B-V|Model
    GLM-4v-Plus|Model
    Sorry-Bench|Benchmark
    VisualRolePlay|Method
    Jailbreak In Pieces|Method
    Visual Adversarial Examples|Method

  proposition: [1178] proposed an inference-time alignment method using cross-model guidance to ensure harmlessness alignment.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    [1178]|PROPOSED|inference-time alignment method
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    [1178]|USES|cross-model guidance

  proposition: JailGuard [1180] mutates untrusted inputs to generate variants.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    JailGuard|MUTATES|untrusted inputs
    
    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: JailGuard leverages discrepancies in model responses to differentiate between attack samples and benign ones.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    JailGuard|DIFFERENTIATES|attack samples
    JailGuard|DIFFERENTIATES|benign samples

  proposition: CIDER [1179] employs a diffusion-based denoiser to mitigate harmful information in adversarial images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    CIDER|USES|diffusion-based denoiser
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    CIDER|MITIGATES|harmful information

  proposition: Multiple benchmarks have been proposed to evaluate Vision-Language Models' defense against jailbreak attacks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Benchmarks|EVALUATE|Vision-Language Models
    Benchmarks|ASSESS|jailbreak attacks

  proposition: MM-safetybench [383] generated 5,040 text-image pairs using typography and stable diffusion.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    MM-safetybench|GENERATED|5,040 text-image pairs
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    MM-safetybench|USES|typography
    MM-safetybench|USES|stable diffusion

  proposition: jailbreakV-28K [1152] combined LLM jailbreak methods with images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    jailbreakV-28K|COMBINES|LLM jailbreak methods
    jailbreakV-28K|COMBINES|images

  proposition: jailbreakV-28K created 28,000 visual-text samples for evaluation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    jailbreakV-28K|CREATED|28,000 visual-text samples
    
    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: SIUO [396] proposed a cross-modality benchmark covering nine critical safety domains.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SIUO|PROPOSED|cross-modality benchmark
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    SIUO|COVERS|nine critical safety domains

  proposition: MMJ-Bench [395] provides a standardized evaluation of VLM jailbreak attack and defense techniques.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    MMJ-Bench|EVALUATES|VLM jailbreak attack techniques
    MMJ-Bench|EVALUATES|VLM defense techniques

  proposition: Li et al. proposed Retention Score [1181] to quantify jailbreak risks using diffusion models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Retention Score|QUANTIFIES|jailbreak risks
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Retention Score|USES|diffusion models

  proposition: The benchmark uses 45 unsafe topics from Sorry-Bench [363].
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Benchmark|USES|Sorry-Bench
    Benchmark|INCLUDES|45 unsafe topics

  proposition: Llama3 Guard [824] is used as the evaluator to detect jailbreak success.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Llama3 Guard|EVALUATES|jailbreak success

  proposition: Percentage of Refuse to Answer (RtA) is used as the primary metric.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Percentage of Refuse to Answer|USED_AS|primary metric
    
    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: VLM jailbreak attacks focus on concealing jailbreak intentions through images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    VLM jailbreak attacks|CONCEAL|jailbreak intentions

  proposition: Attack methods include prompt-to-image and optimization-based approaches.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Attack methods|INCLUDE|prompt-to-image approaches
    Attack methods|INCLUDE|optimization-based approaches

  proposition: MMSafetyBench [383] uses GPT-4o-mini for key phrase extraction.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    MMSafetyBench|USES|GPT-4o-mini
    GPT-4o-mini|EXTRACTS|key phrases

  proposition: VisualRolePlay (VRP) [1150] generates role descriptions and diffusion prompts using GPT-4o-mini.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    VisualRolePlay|USES|GPT-4o-mini
    VisualRolePlay|GENERATES|role descriptions
    VisualRolePlay|GENERATES|diffusion prompts

  proposition: Jailbreak In Pieces [448] extracts key phrases and optimizes images using CLIP model embeddings.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Jailbreak In Pieces|USES|CLIP model embeddings
    Jailbreak In Pieces|EXTRACTS|key phrases
    Jailbreak In Pieces|OPTIMIZES|images

  proposition: Visual Adversarial Examples [1125] focuses on attacks against MiniGPT-4 [1183].
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Visual Adversarial Examples|ATTACKS|MiniGPT-4

  proposition: Larger models tend to have higher Refuse to Answer (RtA) rates.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Larger models|HAVE|higher Refuse to Answer rates
    
    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: Claude-3.5-sonnet has a 99.9% RtA rate against FigStep attacks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Claude-3.5-sonnet|RTA_RATE|99.9%
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Claude-3.5-sonnet|RESISTS|FigStep attacks

  proposition: GPT-4o shows high resistance to various attacks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    GPT-4o|RESISTS|various attacks

  proposition: Llama-3.2-90B-V has a 79.2% RtA rate.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama-3.2-90B-V|RTA_RATE|79.2%
    
    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: GLM-4v-Plus has a 43% RtA rate.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GLM-4v-Plus|RTA_RATE|43%
    
    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: Visual Roleplay attacks show a 100% attack rate.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Visual Roleplay attacks|ATTACK_RATE|100%
    
    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: MMSafetyBench attacks have an 80% success rate.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    MMSafetyBench attacks|SUCCESS_RATE|80%
    
    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: FigStep attacks have a 60% success rate.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    FigStep attacks|SUCCESS_RATE|60%
    
    entity-entity relationships:
